Definition: Column or row headers from each csv file in the dataset.
Distance from nearest river cooridor (RC) project's site.
Stream reach COMID. COMID is an identifier for catchment polycons used by NHDplus.
Median particle size determined by the Networks with EXchange and Subsurface Storage (NEXSS) modell.
d50 estimate based on the Networks with EXchange and Subsurface Storage (NEXSS) model.
Integer representing manual categorization of image suitability.
Median particle size determined by the YOLO model.
Median particle size determined by the model in Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
Log2-transformed d50 value from figure 4 of Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
Count value from histogram bar in figure 4 of Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
Count_raw normalized by dividing by a scaling factor to match scales between sample size in Abeshu et al. and the dataset used for this study.
Filenames of images modeled with YOLO.
Image category: modeling; training; or prediction
d50 based on longest particle axis.
Area of image covered by identified particles.
d50 estimate based on model in Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
Precent urban land cover; catchment scale.
Percent urban land cover; basin scale.
Type of data (numeric; text; date; time; datetime).
Description of the information in a given column or row in the dataset.
Indicates whether the header is a column header or row header.
Unit of measurement that applies to a given column or row in the data package.
The latest date in the file.
A brief description of the files in the data package.
Name of files in the data package.
File path within the data package.
ESS-DIVE Reporting Format or other standard applied to the data file.
The earliest date in the file.
